description:
Valgaav is summoning Dark Star, forcing Lina to use her most powerful spells. As the gate between worlds closes, the scene is rocked by a giant explosion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Avancée à grand pas ! Lamentations éternelles !
Striding and Swaggering! Lamentation Without End!
横行闊歩! 終わりなき慟哭!
